column4: hi, i am not a linux user, yet, i'm windows, however i got a xp box would like to turn into linux, motherboard website has no linux drivers, does that mean no way with my board? msi k8mm-v board AMD Sempron 2800+ 1.60GHz 1gb ram
you should run a live cd to see what you have and see what works and what doesnt
they have weird power management so you'll need acer_acpi
if you run: sudo fdik -l    you can se what the ntfs partition name is and avoid it
just read the screen, its all there for you
found none, should i do sensors-detect?
says no to intel core family thermal sensor, meaning i am sol?
not sure, i dont use intel nor sensors
if you buy with a cooler, it will be suitable (just) for the chip.
buyh a decent cooler and you dont have to even worry
its not the best, no app is the best
